mapper.update:
update daily_keep_record_report
statistics_day = #{statisticsDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_type = #{sourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
register_count = #{registerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
one_remain = #{oneRemain,jdbcType=INTEGER},

fourteen_remain = #{fourteenRemain,jdbcType=INTEGER},
thirty_remain = #{thirtyRemain,jdbcType=INTEGER},
execute_time = #{executeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update daily_keep_record_report set statistics_day = #{statisticsDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_type = #{sourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, register_count = #{registerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, one_remain = #{oneRemain,jdbcType=INTEGER}, two_remain = #{twoRemain,jdbcType=INTEGER}, three_remain = #{threeRemain,jdbcType=INTEGER}, four_remain = #{fourRemain,jdbcType=INTEGER}, five_remain = #{fiveRemain,jdbcType=INTEGER}, six_remain = #{sixRemain,jdbcType=INTEGER}, seven_remain = #{sevenRemain,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fourteen_remain = #{fourteenRemain,jdbcType=INTEGER}, thirty_remain = #{thirtyRemain,jdbcType=INTEGER}, execute_time = #{executeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select DATE_FORMAT(statistics_day,'%Y-%m-%d') as statisticsDay, source_type as sourceType, register_count as registerCount, one_remain as oneRemain, two_remain as twoRemain, three_remain as threeRemain, four_remain as fourRemain, five_remain as fiveRemain, six_remain as sixRemain, seven_remain as sevenRemain, fourteen_remain as fourteenRemain, thirty_remain as thirtyRemain, execute_time as executeTime from daily_keep_record_report where 1=1
and statistics_day > DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and statistics_day <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by statistics_day desc
